name: warrior-usb-recorder
description: Direct USB recording plugin for Titan7 DAW with auto-detection and genre-based effects

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j4
scripts.install-deps: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libportaudio2 libportaudio-dev libusb-1.0-0 libusb-1.0-0-dev cmake build-essential pkg-config

author: Warrior Audio
